Author: Danica22
Title: ANN - ICONSORT BRIDGING THE GAP,CONNECTING TO NEW POSSIBILITIES
Body: Good day everyone,  I regret to inform you that this ICO was failed.  Thank you!   ░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░     ░░░░░░░░░░                     ♦░░TOKEN DETAILS░░♦     The iConsort token will be known as “ICS Token”, this token will serve as a mode of payment to pre-purchase the services offered in the iConsort Platform. Below are the ICS token details: Symbol: ICS Initial Value: 1 ETH = 12,500,000 ICS Type: ERC20  70% of the supply is allocated for the token sale and attributed to the community. 15% is allocated to the Team and Advisors with a lock up period of nine (9) months and three (3) months respectively. 5% will be our token reserves. This will be used for any other miscellaneous transactions such as project development and partnership or other activities deemed necessary in carrying out the operations of the company. 5% is for Airdrop and bounty with a lock up period of one (1) month after listing in the first exchange. This will be used for rewards and bounty campaign. 5% is for Marketing expenses.     ♦░░TOKEN ALLOCATIONS░░♦        ♦░░FUNDS ALLOCATIONS░░♦       ♦░░TEAM░░♦    Why support us?    Because we care. We do not look into the value of the project, our main objective is to make a difference and create a much safer and secured cryptocurrency domain. We want to implement the proper use of blockchain technology through minimizing the risks of being engaged to projects that do not really materialize. We want to make our clients' dream become reality through giving solutions to their needs. We want to contribute to this economic progress. We will lead every investor and investee to the right way.    iConsort Solutions is not just another project. We will change the game.    "Bridging the Gap, Connecting to New"     ░░░░░░░░░░   ░░░░░░░░░░  ░░░░░     ♦░░ADVISORS░░♦    ░░░░░     All Rights Reserved. iConsort Solutions 2018
